Changes: Added changelog and versioning system
Danger Dots are all destroyed when maximum number (64) is reached
Added volume adjustment to settings
Respawn menu option works now
Dynamic accuracy and animated reticle
Gameplay settings persist after death (but not between games)
Aim is now a percentage of Look
Added optional Author field to Submit Feedback form
Added EULA
Player space now orbits Earth kind of realistically
First person toggle enabled (uses [ . ])
Aim offset replicating to multiplayer clients
Firing weapons induces recoil
Weapons can be picked up from the environment
Partially implemented reloaad animation
Gavin's back!
Weapon detaches on character death.
Add inertial roll (enabled by default; adjust in gameplay settings).
Dampen applies to angular velocity (adjust strength in gameplay settings) .
Rotations no longer cause unbearable stuttering.
First-person ADS is usable now (but still needs further improvement).
Settings are simplified and rewired.
Gamepad controls have Gameplay parity with K&M; UI not tested.
Respawn countdown after death.
Debug console enabled. Toggle with "`". Search "Moonshot" for some useful commands.
Valid IDs for MoonshotEquipItem: 0, 3, 4
Weapons can be stowed on the back and swapped out. Use [1] and [2] keys.
Double jump to detach.
Add humans and EVA suit models.
